name: The Blue Tomorrow
description:
Hello everyone! My name is Anatoly, I am from the city of Kurgan (Russia). My English is still worse than my Russian)

Recently I had a dream. In the dream, flying butterflies and discussed the works of Kant. I thought it was a sign and wrote this game. A hard platformer in a minimalist abstract style with great music. The world around the main character dies from infection. He needs help. Make a decision and help your friends)

Enjoy the game and its soundtrack. And poster)

Controls: A,D - move; J - jump; K - shoot; W - use teleport.

System requirements: a computer with two hands)

Enjoy playing:)
